## PHPBrowser class
<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
class PHPBrowser implements WithRequest 
```

<b>Implements:</b> [WithRequest](./php-wasm-node.withrequest.md)

A fake web browser that handles PHPServer's cookies and redirects
internally without exposing them to the consumer.

## Constructors

### PHPBrowser<!-- -->(<!-- -->server<!-- -->: [PHPServer](./php-wasm-node.phpserver.md)<!-- -->, config?<!-- -->: [PHPBrowserConfiguration](./php-wasm-node.phpbrowserconfiguration.md)<!-- -->)

* `server` – The PHP server to browse.
* `config` – Optional. The browser configuration.

Constructs a new instance of the `PHPBrowser` class

## Properties

* `server`    [PHPServer](./php-wasm-node.phpserver.md)
